text: "Don't Stop" is a 1977 song by British American band Fleetwood Mac and taken from their 11th studio album Rumors. It went to number 1 in Canada, number 3 in the United States, number 5 in the Netherlands, number 6 in Belgium, number 30 in Australia, number 32 in the United Kingdom and number 41 in Germany. Category:1977 songs Category:Fleetwood Mac songs Category:Status Quo songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: Don't Stop (Fleetwood Mac song)
